website_summaries.verdict: A great set of bowls with a nice extra-large size on the biggest bowl.
pros: Made from a heavy stainless steel
Includes a nonstick bottom on each bowl
Nice range of sizes on the bowls
Comes with a bonus recipe book
cons: Set doesn't include lids for the bowls

customer_reviews.title: Only 201 Stainless steel - Grossly overpiced Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: Only 201 Stainless steel - Will be returning. Grossly overpriced. Purchase 304 stainless if you want them to last: You may often find stainless steel food containers made from 200 series stainless steel. These are typically less expensive than 304 grade as manufacturers essentially substitute manganese for nickel. Although food safe, they are not as resistant to corrosion and not as high quality as 304 grade. Search for 304 Stainless Steel mixing bowls are you will find a much better quality for a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Coated - short lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a long time before purchasing this set. I wanted a high quality stainless steel set. I received the bowls and examined carefully. I liked the thickness and luster so I decided to purchase a second set. After few weeks of usage the bowls started to develop shallow dents. Upon close inspection it became clear that the balls are coated with a thin layer of some material which is coming off and creating these dents. These bowls are low quality and I will be getting rid of them soon.
customer_reviews.author: ACK00

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing to dislike with these nesting bowls. The bottoms have a non-slip material added which is amazing! Though you can wash in the dishwasher, I prefer to wash by hand because I don't want to take the chance that the material on the bottoms will become dislodged. I really like these bowls and would recommend purchasing them (and the price is reasonable too!).
customer_reviews.author: Susan H. Rolfe

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, non-stick bottom and deep rather than wide bowls
customer_reviews.text: The bowls are great. They look good, have a nice weight, non-stick bottom and deep rather than wide so they store better in the cabinet and there is not as much spray outside of the bowl when mixing in them. Had an issue with one of the bowls upon receipt and the seller was quick to correct the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bowls! So far I am happy that I bought them. I kind of wish I had lids or covers for them. I wonder if Seller has lids or covers for these bowls!
customer_reviews.author: Cowen Quality Masonry

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of all the mixed match plastic items I’ve been using to wash and prep food. Needed something that could be of various uses and doesn’t hold the smell like plastic does. These were perfect. Quality product and non slip bottom was a plus. I also bought a different set and they nestled pretty well. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: T. Le

customer_reviews.title: Well worth purchasing for a number of reasons! Subsequently, I bought a second set.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls! The non-slip padding on the bottom of the bowls is such a lifesaver! It has prevented many spills from my clumsiness and due to limited counter space. I love these so much I bought a second set for our motorhome. The price is very reasonable and they clean up easily! I have used these bowls a lot and the non-slip coating have not cracked or started to peel.
customer_reviews.author: GailJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stainless steel bowls!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the best bowls I’ve owned to date ... I was actually using part of a set that was my Mother’s and they are at least 50 years old. I love that these have the no-slip bottoms too! I highly recommended these to anyone looking for a nice stainless steel bowl set. They’d be a great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: CBM

customer_reviews.title: Pragmatic yet beautiful bowls
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely live this stainless bowl set! It arrived the day before Thanksgiving while the family was cooking together! They all admired it and we washed the set and began using it! From the very large bowls to the small, each had a use. I prepared the dressing in the large bowl, the gravy was served in the smallest, and whether it was preparation or storing food after the meal, every size bowl was useful! I love them. The only thing I'd like to have are covers for the bowls for easier food storage, otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: J Douglas

customer_reviews.title: From the largest to the smallest....wonderful bowls!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great bowls. The best feature is the various sizes and the largest one is so handy for all the large mixes that I do. Also a great feature is the rubber bottom so when I am fiercely mixing something the bowl doesn’t go flying out of my hand which has happened in the past with a solid metal bowl. All in all, a fantastic product and one that I will not hesitate to recommend to all my friends. Thanks a lot
customer_reviews.author: waynjer64

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality
customer_reviews.text: I received this set of bowls as a Christmas gift. I think this is a great product. These bowls stack up nicely and are very easy to clean. The rubber on the bottom help keep them in place on the counter without slipping around. This comes in handy when stirring or whisking. I also like that there is a wide variety of different sizes. The largest bowl is REALLY large. I will thoroughly enjoy using this set of bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Nina L

customer_reviews.title: Best bowls ion the market
customer_reviews.text: Love these bowls! They'ye not made from thin stainless, the base makes them grip well when mixing, and they're pretty to look at. (If the manufacturer is reading this, please add similarly designed measuring cups and both larger and smaller bowls to your product lineup ... I'd certainly buy them!)
customer_reviews.author: Uncle John

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash only!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these because he thought I might like them and knew it was time for a new set. They look nice, as a bonus the non skid part keeps the bowls from hitting each other and making loud metal clang. Haven't really got much use because THEY CANNOT GO IN THE DISHWASHER so it's never my go to. Looks like it will scratch easily but I will update.
customer_reviews.author: g.x.d

customer_reviews.title: Well Built, Lots of Useful Sizes
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are constructed well and the grip coating on the bottom really helps hold bowls in place during use. Only downside is manufacturer recommends hand cleaning instead of dishwasher, but not that big of a deal considering how useful the bowls are.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest, but...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened these I could tell they were on the thin side. They are thinner than other bowls I've had, but I don't need a bowl made of military grade steel. The sizes are perfect and the price was OK. I will use them occasionally and they will probably be fine for that kind of use.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyHayes

customer_reviews.title: Premium Stainless Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Premium Stainless bowls. Light to handle but sturdy when making any of my recipes. Love the no slip bottoms. They nest perfectly. The look is elegant and can go to table or cart. Clean up is easy. With any stainless care is essential. These bowls are very nice. They are great in size and deep to handle any type of recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Walker

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, but great quality
customer_reviews.text: These take up lots of space in my cupboard, but I use them often, and love the size options. I love the silicone bottom, as it holds the bowl still when you're using a hand mixer. I also prefer the high sided bowls when using a mixer. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Roling

customer_reviews.title: Heavier stainless. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These bowls clean up very easily. Not expected to chip and crack. I took a chance on buying the more expensive set of nesting bowls assuming they would be heavier and sturdier than stainless bowls I’ve seen locally. I was not disappointed. They are just what I hoped for plus they don’t slide around due to the thick coating on the bottom. Plus unlike some sets, there are five bowls and no dents that mysteriously appear in stretched metal like trash cans.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: these bowls were amazing, i can't imagine any kitchen without them
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these bowls were amazing, i can't imagine any kitchen without them. These are so useful and the fact that it has that silicone on the bottom and helps it stick to the granite while mixing something is just so great. Highly recommended for every kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Very good, sturdy and heavy duty mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: These bowls exceeded my expectations. They are heavy and durable, have a nice rubber weighted bottom so they don't slip and slide. Great options of sizes. Just an overall really good mixing pan set. I recommend them to anyone that cooks. Could also be used to mix plasters and other hobby things
customer_reviews.author: Viraga

customer_reviews.title: No what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Is not heavy duty very light I was looking for a heavy duty one. Kinda lil off track with the description. With the COVID-19 going on didn’t feel like to return just use it for now .Sam sell their heavy duty set of 5 for $19.99 not steel but good enough for me , couldnt passed this deal up . . Stay safe God blessed
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Salone

customer_reviews.title: I do like these
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that when using hand held mixers, whisks etc, they really get scratched up. I don't think it is really a problem, it just doesn't look good.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls! The no slip grip is a great touch! The varied sizes are awesome too I have used the small one for sauces and the bigger ones for making the batter for cookies and cake with the kiddos who are not the most graceful when using things like mixing bowls! I dont see needing to replace these for a long while and that's a great feeling!
customer_reviews.author: Attilah Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Stainless lasts a lifetime, easy clean, size for every use
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of these I bought at Costco years ago. Bought these for my son who's a big cook to go along with the stainless canister set I also bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LaurelAnn​ Chase-Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set of mixing bowls!
customer_reviews.text: After using these mixing bowls frequently for six months, I can confidently say they have been a great purchase. The non-slip bottom makes a huge difference when energetically mixing contents; these bowls won't slide around your countertop. They're easy to clean (by hand) and so far seem very durable. The variety of sizes is also nice - there's a bowl for pretty much any purpose. Highly recommended if you need mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Just Right For My Cooking Needs
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate three major things about the stainless steel mixing bowls: variety of sizes; durable but light weight enough to manage with my arthritic hands and wrists; and the rubberized bottoms so the bowls don’t go skidding away as I mix. They have been easy for my grandchildren to handle as they learn to cook.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Silicone did not work
customer_reviews.text: The silicone did not keep this bowl in place when mixing cake or cookie batter. I found it to be much too expensive and gimmicky. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Francisca A.

customer_reviews.title: They Stack For Space Saving Storage!
customer_reviews.text: The bowls arrived on time and in excellent condition for Christmas Eve. This was a gift for my wife and she is delighted with this selection. The variety of sizes made this an easy choice. The largest of the bowls will get plenty of use. The stackable storage and the outer coating on the bottom also helped with my decision to purchase this well made set of mixing bowls! I have to recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney V.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Mixing Bowls
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using plastic mixing bowls for the longest time and needed an upgrade. These were the perfect replacement. I love these bowls and it makes my weekly meal prepping so easy. The no slip bottoms are a game changer. You can feel the quality of the bowls by just holding it, the metal is thick and durable with a beautiful shine. I’m excited to continue using these bowls. I foresee using these for years and they’ll hold up to the challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Foster

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect rust spots on stainless steel. This must be a result of the high Chinese production standards. I regret not buying plastic set.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the mixing bowls. I use them for everything. I like the fact it come with different sizes, and above all I like the black bottom part which makes them stable and be able to put hot food in it. Great but and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liora Ben Avida

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bowls!
customer_reviews.text: These are really awesome bowls! The sizes are perfect and the silicone on the bottom really helps prevent kitchen accidents. I love the look as well, I can easily use them to serve salads and sides when entertaining. Overall a great deal and I reccomended it
customer_reviews.author: Eyal Dolev

customer_reviews.title: Great set of commercial quality bowls
customer_reviews.text: Great set of bowls! Well packed and shipped. The rubber bottoms are great when mixing and/or whisking. I marked one down on “Light weight” because, we’ll, THEY’RE HIGH QUALITY MIXING BOWLS! If they were “lightweight” then they would low quality mixing bowls. Anyway, great set. Being used by a trained commercial chef and doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave`

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are the best. I like the plastic grip bottom so they don't slide all over the counter top when you are trying to use them. They arrived in good shape, have been simple to clean, and still look brand new after the first 6 months of kitchen use . Great buy and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sammantha K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and quality! I love the weighted nonslip bottoms. The largest bowl of the 5 is larger than any of my largest mixing bowls and would not quite fit in the drawer, but the other 4 fit perfectly. So glad I found this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at a Excellent  price!
customer_reviews.text: These Monka Non-Skid Mixing Bowls are an excellent addition to any kitchen. Have been using mine continuously for 3 months and have not had a single issue. They are light weight, dishwasher safe and take the day to day punishment of both hot and cold foods. The non-skid bottoms are great on granite work spaces. They stay put when you are mixing product. For the money and the customer service these Monka Non-Skid Bowls are a good investment. You cannot go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are high quality at a good price. They stack well, are perfect for mixing, and clean up very nicely. These were a Christmas gift and the recipient uses them often and has been very pleased with them.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Monka Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Oh! We were very pleased to receive the Premium Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls and happily surprised at the ample sizes. The price was perfect and quality excellent. Food prep is much easier with bowls that do not wobble and are the sizes needed at the moment. Don't put up with those old, mismatched containers you've been using! (Been there).

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: These things are great when your trying to mix and the bowl would start to spin on you. These DO Not MOVE!! they are awesome and easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Very recommended
customer_reviews.text: After month of using this product I can say there are very recommended! Its came in great sizes and very easy to clean them! I'm using only with them when cooking

customer_reviews.title: Looking great even after a month, love the non-slip bootom
customer_reviews.text: Bought them about a month ago, and used them a quite a few times. Still looking great after being in the dish washer a few times. The non-slip bottom really helps when needed to mix batter, so some pancakes mixture.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, very nice quality Stainless Steel bowls, well made and like the non-slip bottom. Time will tell but think they are going to work out great

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls
customer_reviews.text: The package was ordered just before Thanksgiving and arrived by Wednesday for me to cook at my brother’s place. I didn’t realize that it came with a small 8 oz measuring cup-cool surprise. Anyway, I gifted them to my brother, actually, he took them. They’re great bowls because it has the non-slip surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls-Look great
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are super nice. You put them on the counter and they stay! They don't take up much space in the cupboards because they are stackable and I don't have to worry about dropping and breaking them on the tile floor or porcelin sink. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and look good and stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The bowls are well made and look good the coating on the bottom makes them not move. I am glad I bought them. Very happy with my purchase, my friends love them too

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and great value.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent quality mixing bowls for a good price. Good variety of sizes that all nest together well.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these bowls, and the non-skid bottoms work very well. The sizes are perfect for everything from kitchen prep work to tossing a large salad. I know I'll get a lot of use out of these bowls.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bowls so much, I bought a set for my daughter-in-law for Christmas! She loves them also. They are heavier than other Stainless Steel nesting bowls that I have owned and tried - the non-slip bottoms are great for mixing that might result in the bowl slipping.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a x-mas gift for my daughter who does a lot of baking. She loves the fact that the bowls are easy to handle due to the rubber nonslip bottom and easy to clean and put away ! Also very affordable !

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a really super transaction!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of bowls as a gift. The recipient was delighted. She has used the bowls several times now and is thoroughly pleased.

customer_reviews.title: A nice solid set of bowls
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, great price. Handy shapes. I use them constantly. I especially love the giant one -- much bigger than many nesting bowl sets and the non-slip feature is ideal. Even game with cute free measuring cup which I was not expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bowls
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, and love the rubber bottoms to prevent sliding around.

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: glass bowls got too heavy for me I love these...there is just the right size for everything
customer_reviews.author: BLM

customer_reviews.title: Not scratch resistant
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in these bowls. They are not scratch resistant and should be labeled as such. Used a wire wisk on this one to beat 3 eggs and the wisk scratched the bottom and sides. Can’t imagine using these with an electric mixer; the inside of the bow would become a mess.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bowls. They are nice and light but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bowls. They are nice and light but the rubber stuff makes they stick well to the counter while you are working with them. I love these things.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.text: I found these bowls to be exactly as described. Lightweight but quality. I love the non-slip bottoms and multiple sizes. Also came with a handy measuring cup. Great quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: T.E.

customer_reviews.title: I'm baking a lot so those mixing bowls are perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm baking a lot so those mixing bowls are perfect for me! It arrive in five different sizes. Easy to clean, doesn't take a lot of storage space and made of high quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Elad Gil

customer_reviews.title: Huge  bowls . Cleanup is a breezeeeee
customer_reviews.text: Sis, just buy them okay? Just buy them. The large bowls are SPACIOUS and DEEP I love them. I make everything from breads ought to marinating my meat overnight. I love the rubbe bottoms so no moving on the countertop . SIS JUST BUY THEM OKAY? Or bro, you can by them too bro.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Kieh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the non slip rubber bottom. These are great bowls. Light weight and durable. Easy to clean and survived the first round in my dishwasher. I'm very pleased with these bowls.

customer_reviews.title: I love them, I used them for sauce at our ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my new home, I love them, I used them for sauce at our first dinner party. They washed up nicely! Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love making Macarons which require particularly clean surfaces to get them right. These bowls are easy to handle, clean, store and can be used for all kinds of kitchen activities. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hammel

customer_reviews.title: Great set of bowls!
customer_reviews.text: Light but sturdy. The silicon on the bottom prevents them from slipping all over when used. Very durable, practical and necessary in every kitchen ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lital

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowls. I'm very happy that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Villa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls. They are great. I love the weighted non-slip bottoms. Makes working in the kitchen a pleasure. I've had other similar bowls that were thinner and took dents. These bowls are thicker and I don't expect to have the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: nice set
customer_reviews.text: The bowels are cute and design for the purpose it stated for.
customer_reviews.author: donise

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Haven't used them a whole lot but when ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Haven't used them a whole lot but when I did, I used the biggest one. Nice size. Rubber on the bottom is awesome. Bright as hell. You really find out if there's any little tiny speck of anything on your towel when you're drying the bowls. It'll show.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Andres Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love these bowls! They are super-sturdy and do not slide around when using them. I've tried a lot of other bowls and these are head and shoulders above those.
customer_reviews.author: Walt in NC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: They nest; they're attractive; they clean easily (unless you're a doofus and don't follow the care guidelines); and they sit where you put 'em. They're among the few things you can get that actually do what they say they will and what they're supposed to....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of sizes! They're absolutely perfect! The non slip bottoms work great, especially since I usually have a baby in my arms while cooking 😂
customer_reviews.author: Gustasonk

customer_reviews.title: They are good
customer_reviews.text: They are great the only bad thing is that the big bowl has a scratch in the inside of it. Other than that they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Arnold Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Actually very slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel great. The bowls stay in the same spot on the counter while stirring. I bought another set for my girlfriend and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: CAYER71

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sister as she bakes quite frequently. I have only heard good things and she is very pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Ian Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Used everyday. Nice quality and durable. Like the rubber bottom to keep bowl in place during use.
customer_reviews.author: JESGUN

customer_reviews.title: Great set of mixing bowls.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of mixing bowls. They are a nice weight and I love the non slip bottom. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bow

customer_reviews.title: I am quite satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am quite satisfied with this purchase. The bowls replaced a set I used in my kitchen for some 25 years, and they are of a heavier gauge steel than the originals. I look forward to using these for many years to come. They will likely outlast me.
customer_reviews.author: George Reed

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mixing bowls
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking mixing bowls. They were a gift for my son. He loves them. The non skid bottoms are fantastic. The only complaint would be that I'd prefer a 4 quart size mixing bowl instead of the 2 very small sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Love but wish they had lids
customer_reviews.text: If they had lids they would be a perfect 5 Star

customer_reviews.title: A very impressing and beautiful stainless steel bowls
customer_reviews.text: A very impressing and beautiful stainless steel bowls. Great quality and so easy to clean. I just love the sturdy base, doesn’t slip on counter. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: ofir

customer_reviews.title: Things are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of using my glass mixing bowls and having my mixer fling out everything I was mixing because they were too shallow. These bowls are deep and the rubber bottom prevents them from moving. Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful set of mixing bowls. High quality stainless with a mirror finish. These would be a nice gift. After a year the second largest bowl split at the top about one inch. I love the bowls and I would love to buy a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne whiddon

customer_reviews.title: great bowls
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the non skid bottoms nd the rugged durability of these graduating stainless bowls

customer_reviews.title: They’re the best quality for the price that I’ve seen anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty stainless steel bowl set is outstanding. They’re the best quality for the price that I’ve seen anywhere. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bowls
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bowls , high quality finish and the top the non slip rubber bottom. Didn't seen these before. Great seller that offers 1 year warranty and included a free recipe book. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shay H.

customer_reviews.title: They were just better than we thought
customer_reviews.text: I just started to buy things for my first apartment and bought these. I haven't used them but my wife says they are awesome and gave me big fat kiss for buying them. I bet we'll be buying more things from these guys. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin A

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, durable, weighty, and the nonslip base is very helpful when mixing. Very glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, no-slip bowls
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my mother. She's been using them since Christmas and absolutely loves them. The sizes are perfect for her uses and the non-slip base keeps the bowl from sliding.

customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas. He is a great cook and has been extremely pleased with the bowls. Since they don't move around, he says he can do two things at once.
customer_reviews.author: Marieanne Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My mom freshened up her kitchen with new cabinets and appliances and wanted to stainless steel bowls. We live the look and quality of this product. We wil definitely purchase more. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my new mixing bowls!
customer_reviews.text: My family uses them daily. They are super easy to clean and I love the non skid bases!

customer_reviews.title: Love the bowls
customer_reviews.text: Love the bowls, exactly like advertised. Cook book that comes with it was a joke, waste of money to have it printed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Bowls
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are very sturdy, and have a very shiny, easy-to-clean exterior. While the bowls are very sturdy, they are light enough to be easily handled. The rubberized outer coating makes them easy to grasp; and the combination of sizes in this set is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ray in NE Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: The materials seem to be very good. I think it'll last for a long time. Cleaning is very easy and the sizes are great. I think I made the right choice. Also, customer service contacted me to see if there was any problem with shipping and feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Bettio

customer_reviews.title: But they look fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as a gift so I did not use them. But they look fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Cathe

customer_reviews.title: The extra small bowl is pretty handy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set with the rubber grip bottoms and the extra small bowl. Very nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Bnumonic

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bowls
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bowls, perfect sizes . I bake a lot, so I had paid 26$ just for 1 bowl ,so this price is great for 5. I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: She LOVES these bowls
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described and arrived timely. They were a Christmas present and the recipient LOVES these bowls. Monka will be seeing my business again I presume!! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great set!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of bowls and planning to buy another set for our motor home. Stack in small amount of space and you can serve in them as well as prepare foods. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SecureTronics

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowls. Love the grips on the bottom of each bowl and the different sizes are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Bowls are weighted in bottom with rubber. Does not slip or slide on counter when mixing.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Morris

product_meta.title: Premium Stainless Steel Mixing Bowls With Non Slip Bottom (Set of 5). Sizes 8, 5, 3, 1.7, 0.75 QT For Healthy Meal, Nesting and Stackable .MONKA
feature_bullets: 🍎 STYLISH UPSCALE MODERN DESIGN: Stainless steel always looks great, but extra touches like a no-slip silicone coating are both classy and functional.
🍎 PROTECT YOUR WORKING SURFACE, WITH THE NON-SLIP BOTTOM COATING: The Mixing bowls has silicon coating, prevents the bowls move during use.

🍎 SUITABLE FOR MULTI USE: The Monka Mixing bowls with handles provides perfect 5 different sizes (EXTRA Large bowl: 8QT. Large bowl: 5QT. Medium box: 3QT Small box: 1.7QT. Extra Small box: 0.75QT). for any kitchen work: Use it for: Mix the salads, Serving Snacks or Popcorn, Preparing a cake or pancake mixture, Washing fruits and vegetables, or any other use.

🍎 UNLIKE OTHER BOWLS THAT ARE FLIMSY AND EASILY DENT: Each bowl in the Monka cookware set is made of commercial grade stainless steel that designed to resist dents. The 0.22'' (0.56mm) steel is durable and designed to hold up for years no matter what you throw at it. making them an ideal gift for a birthday, Christmas or any other holiday

🍎 EASY CLEANUP & STORAGE: Monka is an easy to clean product. The deep bowls can be cleaned with water and soap or in the dishwasher. This stainless-steel shine after every washing & wiping. Reduce trash and protect the environment with this multi-use and eco-friendly product. Monka saves you storage space in your kitchen. It enables to store the bowls one inside the other – 5 IN 1
